processing.text: if @@admin = 0 and @type = '1' begin if @@sysDatabaseName.dbo.AI_ERP$System$GetAuthorize(@@admin, @@userID, '&Controller;', 'Edit') = 0 select @type = '0' end declare @field varchar(32), @r int, @duplicate nvarchar(512), @message nvarchar(512), @invalidDate nvarchar(512), @itemNotConfig nvarchar(4000) select @duplicate = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Ngày hiệu lực chưa nhập hoặc giá trị không hợp lệ tại dòng %s.' else 'Effective Date must not be blank or has invalid value at row %s.' end select @invalidDate = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Ngày hiệu lực đến phải lớn hơn hoặc bằng trường ngày hiệu lực từ tại dòng %s.' else '"Effective date to must be larger than or equal to effective date from at row %s.' end select @itemNotConfig = case @@language when 'v' then N'Mã hàng tại ô %invalidCell chưa khai báo đánh giá nhà cung cấp.' else 'The item of cell %invalidCell has not been configured for vendor evaluation.' end if @type = '0' delete @@table from @@table a join bigiatt b on a.ma_bp0 = b.ma_bp0 and a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt and a.ngay_hl_tu = b.ngay_hl_tu -- Checking &Checking; -- Gather select a.* into #k from @@table a join bigiatt b on a.ma_bp0 = b.ma_bp0 and a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt and a.ngay_hl_tu = b.ngay_hl_tu select @field = 'ma_bp0' if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select @field, stt, '00002' from #k where ma_bp0 not in (select distinct ma_bp0 from bisyspurorgrights where user_id = @@userID and r_edit = 1) &w1;@field&w2;stt&w3;'00002'&w4; &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @r = min(stt) from #k where ma_bp0 not in (select distinct ma_bp0 from bisyspurorgrights where user_id = @@userID and r_edit = 1)&Error; end select distinct ma_vt, dvt into #dvt from #table update a set dvt = rtrim(b.val) from #dvt a join bidmvtts b on a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt where a.dvt = '' and b.name = 'dvt' if exists(select 1 from #dvt where dvt = '') begin declare @dvt varchar(33) select top 1 @dvt = rtrim(val) from bidmts where name = 'dvt' and controller = 'Item' if @dvt is not null update #dvt set dvt = @dvt where dvt = '' update a set dvt = rtrim(b.dvt) from #dvt a join dmvt b on a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt where a.dvt = '' end update #table set dvt = b.dvt from #table a join #dvt b on a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'ngay_hl_den', stt, 'C002' from @@table where (ngay_hl_den is not null and ngay_hl_den < ngay_hl_tu) &EndErrorCount; &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'ngay_hl_tu', b.stt, 'C001' from @@table a join @@table b on a.stt < b.stt and a.ma_bp0 = b.ma_bp0 and a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt and (a.ngay_hl_den is not null and b.ngay_hl_tu <= a.ngay_hl_den) and (b.ngay_hl_den is not null and b.ngay_hl_den >= a.ngay_hl_tu) &EndErrorCount; &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'ngay_hl_tu', stt, 'C001' from @@table a join bigiatt b on a.ma_bp0 = b.ma_bp0 and a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt and (a.ngay_hl_den is not null and b.ngay_hl_tu <= a.ngay_hl_den) and (b.ngay_hl_den is not null and b.ngay_hl_den >= a.ngay_hl_tu) where not(@type = '1' and a.ma_bp0 = b.ma_bp0 and a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt and a.ngay_hl_tu = b.ngay_hl_tu) &EndErrorCount; &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'ma_vt', stt, 'C003' from @@table a where not exists(select 1 from bidmvttsbp0 b where a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt and a.ma_bp0 = b.ma_bp0 and b.name = 'danh_gia_ncc' and b.val = '1') and not exists(select 1 from bidmvtts b where a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt and b.name = 'danh_gia_ncc' and b.val = '1') &w1;'ma_vt'&w2;stt&w3;'C003'&w4; &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @r = min(stt) from @@table where (ngay_hl_den is not null and ngay_hl_den < ngay_hl_tu) if @r is not null begin select replace(@invalidDate, '%s', @r) as message return end select @r = min(b.stt) from @@table a join @@table b on a.stt < b.stt and a.ma_bp0 = b.ma_bp0 and a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt and (a.ngay_hl_den is not null and b.ngay_hl_tu <= a.ngay_hl_den) and (b.ngay_hl_den is not null and b.ngay_hl_den >= a.ngay_hl_tu) if @r is not null begin select replace(@duplicate, '%s', @r) as message return end select @r = min(stt) from @@table a join bigiatt b on a.ma_bp0 = b.ma_bp0 and a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt and (a.ngay_hl_den is not null and b.ngay_hl_tu <= a.ngay_hl_den) and (b.ngay_hl_den is not null and b.ngay_hl_den >= a.ngay_hl_tu) where not(@type = '1' and a.ma_bp0 = b.ma_bp0 and a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt and a.ngay_hl_tu = b.ngay_hl_tu) if @r is not null begin select replace(@duplicate, '%s', @r) as message return end select @field = 'ma_vt', @message = @itemNotConfig, @r = min(stt) from @@table a where not exists(select 1 from bidmvttsbp0 b where a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt and a.ma_bp0 = b.ma_bp0 and b.name = 'danh_gia_ncc' and b.val = '1') and not exists(select 1 from bidmvtts b where a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt and b.name = 'danh_gia_ncc' and b.val = '1')&Error; end -- Do not delete following line -- #OverwriteChecking &EndErrorMode; if @type = '1' delete @@table from @@table a where exists(select 1 from #k b where a.ma_bp0 = b.ma_bp0 and a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt and a.ngay_hl_tu = b.ngay_hl_tu) -- Insert &Inserting;
